plans.privacy.visible to friends?: Urikuda kuti shamwari dzako dzione maverengero ako here?
plans.title: Chirongwa chekuverenga
plans.none found: Tasha chirongwa chawunga farira. Zama kutsvaga zvimwe zvinga enderana newe.
plans.view sample: Tarira uone zvinenge zvakaita zvirengwa zvacho
plans.success widget title: Shandisa uwane zvizhinji kubva pachirongwa chako
plans.success blurb: Chirongwa chekuverenga shoko chinoita kuti Izwi raMwari riwane nzvimbo mukati mezuva rako. Kazhinji vanhu vanosarira kumashure pano ne apo. Kunxwa zvino taurwa naShe zuva ne zuva zvakakosha, saka tino kubatsira pano ne apo kuti ugare uri panzvimbo.
plans.you have no plans: Hausi kana pachirongwa chimwe chete zvacho pari zvino.
plans.filter by lang: Tsvaga zvirongwa maererano nerurimi rwauno nzwisia
plans.no content: Hurongwa hwako hausi kuonesa zviverengwa zvanhasi, izvo zvinoratidza kuti zviverengwa zvanhasi zvazadziswa.
plans.catch up text: Endesa zviverengo zvanhasi kuzuva rawakapedzisira kuverenga (zuva {last_completed_day} rechirongwa).
plans.catch up description only: Kana wasaririra kumashure kwechirongwa chako, usakahadzika! Unokwanisa kuenda kumashre pawakasira zviverengo zvako.
plans.restart description: Unokwanisa kutangidza chirongwa chako. Zvawaka verenga kare zvose uye nezvawaita zvinotanga patsva.
plans.privacy description.private: Chirongwa chako hachisi kuonekwa nepovho. Chinja kuti Shamwari Chete kana uchida kuti shamwari dzako dzione maverengero ako echirongwa ichi.
plans.privacy description.public: Chirongwa chako chirikuonekwa neshamwari dzako. Chinja kuita puraivheti kuti vanhu vasaone maverengero aurikuita pachirongwa ichi.
plans.accountability: Kuva muhnu ano kwanisa kuvimbika naye uye anogona kuzvinini pisa pasi pevamwe vanhu
plans.email weekly report to a friend: tumira stamba svondo rega rega kune umwe kana vanhu vazhinji cari muYouVersion
plans.email_on: Batidza chiratidzo chekuti zvawatumira zvasvika here
plans.email_off: Dzima chiratidzo chekuti zvawatumira zvasvika here
plans.partner added successful: Wabudirira! {username} anenge ave kutarisira nekubatsira pachirongwa.
plans.reminder on successful: Wabudirira! Uchatumirwa tsamba yokukurangaridza mazuva ose.
plans.reminder off successful: Tsamba dzekuku rangaridza mazuva ose hadzichatumirwa
plans.email delivery on successful: Tsamba dze zviverengwa zvako zvamazuva ose dzichatumirwa pa emial.
plans.report on successful: Tsamba dzekukuzivisa mashandisiro pamwe nekukubatsira dzichatumirwa masvondo ose.
plans.report off successful: Tsamba dzezviziviso pamwe nekukubatsira hadzicha tumirwa masvondo ose.
plans.must start to complete: Tanga chirongwa chino kuti ugochengeta zviverengwa zvawapedza
plans.invalid reference: Tine urombo, ndima yezviverengo haiwaniki muvhezheni yasarudzwa. Yedza kusarudza imwe vhezheni, pamusoro. Ukaramba uchiona chiziviso ichi, tapota udza vabatsiri kuti ndizvo zvirikuitika.

containers.Auth.title: Events Sign In
containers.Auth.subHead1:
If you are a Bible App user and you already have a YouVersion account, you can sign in using your same credentials.

Don’t have a YouVersion account yet?
Sign up now at Bible.com to start creating Events.

features.Auth.errors.sessionExpired: Your session expired. Please login again.
features.EventEdit.errors.locationMustHa: All locations must have at least one time.
features.EventEdit.errors.contentRequire: You cannot publish an Event with no content.
features.EventEdit.errors.planSearchFail: Search did not match any documents
features.EventEdit.features.content.comp:
Learn how to make
a great Event

Outlines, key points, discussion questions… Share any text-based general content that will help your attenders follow along with your message as it’s happening. Your text modules can be any length and can include rich text formatting.

Select any Bible verse or passage, linked directly to any of YouVersion’s 1,200+ versions, in 900+ languages. People viewing your Event can tap your reference to see it in their Bible App reader, where they can Bookmark it, Highlight it, and more.
Link to Bible Plans and Devotionals that relate to your teaching points, helping your audience continue to engage with God’s Word throughout the week.

Bring your Event to life with any kind of supporting graphics: series art, photos, Verse Images etc. Attenders will be able to easily share your Event images to their social media, taking your message viral.
Creates a button inside your Event that links to any external website. Put your audience just one tap away from online giving, volunteer signup, or church home pages.

Church news, calendar events, programs, classes, volunteer and missions opportunities... Announcement modules are the perfect container for sharing information that’s timely and important, but that you don’t want to distract from your Event’s primary message. Each announcement module appears on its own page in your Event, and can even include rich text content (such as bold and italics).
In your Event, only your Title (above) will be visible. When a user taps on your Title, the Body (below) displays on a separate screen.
Content will automatically save a few seconds after you stop typing.
Image size must be {requiredWidth}x{requiredHeight}. Your image is {yourWidth}x{yourHeight}.
mhando yefaira haisiyo inofanira iri JPG
If you are looking for a smart, simple giving platform, try Kindrid.
Haukwanisi kudzima kana chiitiko chiri mudariro
Once an Event has gone live, you cannot delete Text, Bible Reference, and Image modules from it because users may have already added their private notes to them. You can, however, edit these modules.
features.EventEdit.features.details.erro: A single service cannot be more than 12 hours, and the difference between the earliest start time and the latest end time on an Event cannot be more than 8 days. Please adjust your Event times and try again.
features.EventEdit.features.details.comp: Image size must be {requiredWidth}x{requiredHeight}. Your image is {yourWidth}x{yourHeight}.
mhando yefaira haisiyo inofanira iri JPG
Your image dimensions should be {requiredWidth} x {requiredHeight} pixels.
features.EventEdit.features.location.com: Did you know? You can launch an online ministry for free using the Church Online Platform.
Wasarudza nzvimbo iyi inotevera kuti idzimwe
Izvi zvinobvisa nzvimbo dzezviitiko zvakare nezvaezvino Hauchakwanisi kushandisa nzvimbo iyi pazviitiko zvamangwana
Optional: Useful if adding multiple locations
Enter a city to set a timezone...
Shift all dates and times at once
To add, edit, or delete the Locations and Times, temporarily unpublish the event. During this time, your event will not be visible in search results. Don’t forget to publish your event again.
features.EventEdit.features.preview.note: Sign in to add your private notes…
features.EventEdit.features.preview.comp: Your event will be visible in Bible App Event location and search results 5 days before your earliest start time.
The red LIVE badge will display when your earliest start time begins.

Your Event will no longer be discoverable after its final end time. Attenders who tapped “Save Event” when your Event was discoverable will still have access to an archived version of it, This Event will also continue to be accessible through direct inbound links.
Auth.sign up alternate: Wagara une account here? Sign In
Auth.plan blurb: Zvinoratidza kunge unechirongwa chebhaibheri chawakuda kutanga. Zvirongwa izvi zvinoita kuti ukwanise kuti bhaibheri rive muktai maupenyu hwako mazuva ose. Vhura account yako ukwanise kushandisa chirongwa ichi.
Auth.bookmark blurb: Zviri kuratidza kuti unoda kushandisa mamaka. Maka inoita kuti ukwanise kuziva pawapedzisira kuverenga shoko uye uchewngete mavhesi,
Auth.friends blurb: Zviri kuratidz kuti unoda kutaura neshamwari dzako. Chin hu chakanaka! unokwanisa kuvaudza zvaunenge uchidzidza uye zvoita kuti mukwanise kukurudzirana kuverenga shoko raMwari.
Auth.share blurb: Tirikuona kuti urikuda kutaurira shamwari dzako Shoko raMwari. Chinhu chakanaka! Unokwanisa kuvataurira paFacebook kana Twitter. Pinda kana gadzira account kuti utange!
Auth.highlight blurb: Tirikuona kuti urikuda kumaka Shoko raMwari. Chinhu chakanaka! Zvimakwa zvinobatsira kuti uronge nekuwana mavhesi aunofarira. Pinda kana gadzira account kuti utange!
Auth.note blurb: Tirikuona kuti urikuda kugadzira chinyorwa muShoko raMwari. Chinhu chakanaka! Zvinyorwa zvinokubatsira kukuyeuchidza nekoronga chokwadi chaunoona muBhaibheri Pinda kana gadzira account kuti utange!
Reader.plan title ref: Free Reading Plans and Devotionals related to {reference}
Reader.plan subtitle: Bible Plans break your Scripture reading into manageable daily portions. Plans often include supporting devotional, audio, or video selections. Whether you call them Bible Plans, Reading Plans, or Devotionals, Plans are a proven way that you can make the Bible a natural part of your everyday life.
Reader.meta.mobile.title: Bible App yacho
Reader.meta.site.title: Enda kuBible.com
Reader.chapterpicker.chapter unavailable: This chapter is not available in this version. Please choose a different chapter or version.
Reader.verse action.no labels: You don't have any labels yet. Simply start typing and press Enter to add a new label to this Bookmark. Once you've created a new label, it will be available for you to add to any of your Bookmarks.
by myself description: Chengeta maverengero ako akavanzika, kana kuti shamwari dzako dziwone
with friends description: Koka Shamwari kuti dzibatirane newe pa Chirongwa ichi. Munoverenga mose nemwero wakafanirana, uye munokwanisa kukurukura zvamunenge muchidzidza muShoko raMwari.
plan privacy prompt: Urikuda kuti shamwari dzako dzione maverengero ako here?
future start blurb: Kutanga pazuva ririmberi kunobatsira Shamwari dzako kuti dziwane nguva yekugamuchira kukoka kwawavaita.
join link: Ani nani ane link anokwanisa kujoina
join together share: Ungada here kuverenga hurongwa hwebhaibheri, {plan}, pamwechete neni?
get a free bible: Tora Bhaibheri ramahara pa mbozhanhare yako, pa tablet yako napa computer yako.
your snapshot: Heino snapshot yegore rako uri muBible App
STORIESEXAMPLES: Adhamu na Evha, Nowa, Mozisi, Esteri, Jesu, Pauro nevamwe vakawanda

share.find_friends.invite_email_html:
Hesi!

Ndirikushandisa Bible App yeYouVersion uye ndirikuda kusheyawo newe.Kana usati wamborishandisa,rinorerutsa kubudisa kanaka nechokwadi chebhaibheri muhupenyu hwako mazuva ose.

Tora Bible App;verenga,ona,inzwa uye sheya pamafoni kana tabuleti,nepaindaneti pa Bible.com

Gadzira akaundi yako:shandisa mazano ebhaibheri uye unowana kuzomaka,kutara mavhesi nekunyorawo manotsi pamafoni kana matabuleti

Isa shamwari (kufanana neni!): tsvagiridza uye taurirana nezve Bhaibheri nevamwe vanhu vaunodisa

Zvese zviri muBible App - tangira pano:
share.invite_email_body:
Hesi!

Ndirikushandisa Bible App yeYouVersion uye ndirikuda kusheyawo newe.Kana usati wamborishandisa,rinorerutsa kubudisa kanaka nechokwadi chebhaibheri muhupenyu hawoko mazuva ose.

Tora Bible App;verenga,ona,inzwa uye sheya pamafoni kana tabuleti,nepaindaneti pa Bible.com

Gadzira akaundi yako:shandisa mazano ebhaibheri uye unowana kuzomaka,kutara mavhesi nekunyorawo manotsi pamafoni kana matabuleti.

Isa shamwari (kufanana neni!): tsvagiridza uye taurirana nezve Bhaibheri nevamwe vanhu vaunodisa.

Zvese zviri muBible App - tangira pano:
share.invite_facebook: Ndinoda Bible App! Yanyatondibatsira kuti ndiite kuti Bhaibheri rive muhupenyu hwangu zuva nezuva. Inondibatsira kumaka, kunzwa Bhaibheri richiverengwa, kunyorawo manotsi, kutevera zvirongwa zvezvikamu zvemuBhaibheri zvakarongwa uye kuonawo mavhidhiyo! Enda unotora iyezvino Bible App (mahara):
share.invite_facebook_direct: Une Bible App here? Ndinorida, ndofunga newewo ungaridawozve. Unoiwana apa:
share.invite_sms: Ndinoda Youversion Bhaibheri App. Ndinofunga kuti newewo uchaidawo:
share.invite_twitter: @YouVersion Bible App ine nzvimbo yayo yainogara iri pafoni pangu. Verenga, ona, inzwa kana kugoverawo vamwe, zvese zviri muapp yemahara:
share.invite_twitter_direct: Une Bible App kubva ku @YouVersion here? Ndinoida and ndinofunga kuti newe uchaidawo. Unokwanisa kuiwana apa:
